description:
Pitch fast and travel light. The Gold Camp UL 3 Tarp uses a single pole design and ultralight materials to keep your base weight at a minimum. Pair with the optional footprint and Mesh Inner for an extra buffer between you and mother nature.

  • Made of ultralight, tear resistant polyester ripstop with a polyurethane coating for weather resistance
  • Pitch with the adjustable centre pole or hang with the exterior peak loop
  • Centre pole adjusts from 168-203cm
  • Reflective mid body guy out points with adjustable stake out loops add structure
  • Storm flap and low vent technology for optimal airflow
  • Includes 12 Dirt Dagger™ UL stakes
  • Add the optional Gold Camp UL 3 Mesh Inner for extra protection from the elements. (sold separately)
  • Interior loop system for compatibility with gear lofts and mtnGLO lights. (sold separately)
  • Available footprint with reinforced center pole pocket. (sold separately)
name: Big Agnes Gold Camp UL 3-Person Tarp
